GenAiPromptTemplate.description: Preview a Change of the Javascript

templateVersions.content:
If the following text is valid javascript, repeat the text back exactly. Write the response in valid javascript syntax - do not include markdown or ``` marks. If the JS is invalid, add a comment explaining why it's invalid.
Javascript code to validate: ``` {!$Input:JS_to_preview} ```

If the following text is valid javascript, repeat the text back exactly. Write the response in valid javascript syntax - do not include markdown or ``` marks. If the JS is invalid, add a comment explaining why it's invalid.
Javascript code to validate: ``` {!$Input:JS_to_preview} ```
